publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5184 Ms Maureen Watt: Congratulations to Newmachar Primary School—That the Parliament notes the efforts of pupils at Newmachar Primary School who raised £1,000 to purchase two "boxes of life" from Shelterbox; further notes that these structures contain life-saving equipment which helps victims of natural disasters to survive; congratulates the pupils and the school on this outstanding charitable gesture; further notes that Shelterbox is now writing to every school in the country, and hopes that many more schools will follow Newmachar’s excellent example. Supported by: Mrs Nanette Milne*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Robin Harper*, Mr David Davidson*

S2M-5184 Congratulations to Newmachar Primary School (lodged on 17 November 2006) John Swinburne*, Brian Adam*, Chris Ballance*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-5184 Congratulations to Newmachar Primary School (lodged on 17 November 2006) Rosie Kane*
S2M-5184 Congratulations to Newmachar Primary School (lodged on 17 November 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Dave Petrie*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-5184 Congratulations to Newmachar Primary School (lodged on 17 November 2006) Shiona Baird*
